4312720.name: Is Guilty Demo
4312720.description:
Experience the first two nights of Is Guilty, the psychological horror job simulator where you must identify criminals while working the night shift.

In this free demo, you will learn the ropes of your dual life: barista by day (technically night), investigator by necessity.

DEMO FEATURES

  • Play Day 1 & Day 2: Complete two full shifts with unique customers and cases.

  • Learn the Tools: Master the License Plate Scanner, Criminal Database, and Coffee Machine.

  • The Nightmare Begins: Experience the initial escalation of paranormal events.

  • Save Your Progress: Your progress in the demo carries over to the full game!

FULL GAME VS DEMO

This demo contains the Tutorial and the first Investigation. The full game features 7 increasingly terrifying days, severe weather events (Storms, Blackouts), difficult moral choices, and multiple endings.

Download now and start your shift. Don't let the Watcher catch you making a mistake.
